channel.title: CVE Feed for comparisonslider -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for comparisonslider -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4422|2024-05-30T08:30:11.397Z -- comparisonslider -- comparison%20slider
item.description: The Comparison Slider plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the slider title parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4422|2024-06-06T18:43:50.162Z -- comparisonslider -- comparison%20slider
item.description: The Comparison Slider plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the slider title parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
